topic.title: Commissioning Data Set XML Schema Version Numbering
topic.shortdesc: The CDS XML Schema Version Number FormatThe use of XML was mandated by the e-Government Interoperability Framework (e-GIF) programme as the standard to be used for messaging by government organisations and has accordingly been adopted by the NHS.
